title: Rode the Blazing Heat
report: Sweated like mad, and had tingling all over my skin. Once the pain peaked, the coasting began, with a sense of increased focus and slight euphoria. Definitely something there, and it feels great on a really hot day when sweat just douses me.

erowid.citation: al quimica. "Rode the Blazing Heat: experience with Capsicum spp. (Serrano) (ID 62929)". Erowid.org. May 23, 2007. erowid.org/exp/62929
